participant_1.background:
I work 60 hours a week so I can't go to the game, but I'll be cheering from home!
I remember singing along to Queens of the Stone Age with my sisters in the car on long road trips.
I work hard and save money for my future.
i am a financial analyst for a brewery.
i own a french bulldog.

participant_2.background:
I've been at my current job for 3 years.
i like to go to the casino on weekends.
I am usually pretty shy, but my new job is helping me come out of my shell.
my major was american literature and education.
My kids are playing video games on a rainy day, which is a good excuse for me to practice my music.

content.text: I love Queens of the Stone Age. They're the best!
I can't believe I'm talking to someone who likes the same music as me! They're my favorite band too!
That's so awesome! I've been a fan for years.
Me too! I love all of their music.
Me too! Their new album is so good.
I know! I can't stop listening to it.
Do you know when they're coming to town?
Not that I know of. I hope they do soon though!
Me too! I would love to see them live.
Me too! That would be so much fun.
We should go together if they come!
